description: Indias AI landscape is evolving at a breathtaking pace, and at the forefront of this revolution is the ET AI Awards 2025, the countrys most prestigious platform recognizing innovation, impact, and excellence in artificial intelligence. title: Amazon founder Jeff Bezos says ‘AI bubble’ is real but its impact on society will be ‘gigantic’
description: Big Tech is spending billions of dollars on advanced artificial intelligence chips and data centers, driven by the belief that they are all competing in the AI race.
